title: Asylum limits at Mexico border expected to end May 23, sources say; US braces for influx of migrants

sentence: Kyrsten Sinema and Mark Kelly, both Arizona Democrats, issued a similar warning last week, citing the projected impacts on local communities and border security.
author: Callie Patteson
title: Biden administration to scrap Title 42 border policy by May 23 despite warnings: reports

sentence: Moderate Democratic Senator Kyrsten Sinema said Wednesday that she and fellow Arizona Senator Mark Kelly spoke with the Department of Homeland Security (DHS) about not ending Title 42 until there are other safeguards in place at the border.
title: Biden administration pledges to deport migrants caught illegally crossing the US border 'IMMEDIATELY' as both Democrats and Republican warn of a 'mass migrant event' when Title 42 is lifted in May
